pageContent:
AKINWALE AKINTOLAYO 
Indianapolis, IN | akin.akintolayo@gmail.com | 317 222-0484 |  
 INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ANALYST 
Dedicated and detail-oriented IT analyst with 4 years of experience in system administration, 
network management, and infrastructure support. Skilled in troubleshooting complex technical 
issues, implementing system upgrades, and ensuring the optimal performance of IT systems. 
Skilled in maximizing productivity by patching and upgrading various applications, planning, 
installing, and configuring Windows Servers and Workstations. 
HIGHLIGHTS 
● Experience in Active Directory, Computer Imaging and SCCM 
● Excellent task management. Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously. 
● Experience with security toolkits such as Kali Linux, Metasploit, and Burp Suite Pro. 
● Proficient in translating information from technical to executive/management 
terminology  
SKILLS  
Certifications: CompTIA A+, Network+ Security+ Pentest+ and AWS Cloud 
Practitioner

● Proficient in translating information from technical to executive/management 
terminology

Window Servers.

RELEVANT EXPERIENCE 
SYSTEM ENGINEER  
SAIPRO LLC / TATA CONSULTANCY, IN (Eli-Lilly) June 2022 – Present 
• 24/7/365 availability for critical restarts of infrastructure, software, hardware, and internet 
connection. 
• Responsible for designing a system that meets the client's requirements while considering 
technical, operational, and financial constraints. They need to understand the client's needs 
and convert them into a system design. 
• Responsible for integrating different hardware and software components to ensure that they 
function as a coherent system. They need to make sure that the different components work 
together  seamlessly,  and  they  are  often  responsible  for  testing  the  integrated  system  to 
ensure it meets the requirements. 
• Writing PowerShell script for Backup and other automation purposes. 
• Setting up and managing Active directory domain controller. 
• Build and configure Hyper-V and VMware servers.

• Writing PowerShell script for Backup and other automation purposes. 
• Setting up and managing Active directory domain controller. 
• Build and configure Hyper-V and VMware servers. 
• Act as a technical expert or lead for local computer system administration. 
• Setting up Secure Desktop for data Credibility. 
• Responsible  for  testing  the  system  to  ensure  it  meets  the  performance, reliability,  and 
functionality requirements. They need to identify and troubleshoot any problems that arise 
during the testing process. 
• Administer networks. 
• Establishing and maintaining key client interaction and support, providing administrative 
reporting on the infrastructure to Lilly IT management. 
• Using  RDP  infrastructure  to  implement  and  carry  out  remote  tasks  on  servers  and 
workstations. 
• Responsible  for  deploying  the  system  into  production,  which  involves  installing  the 
system, configuring it, and ensuring that it is working correctly.

• Setting  up  and  managing  Group  policy  in  windows  server  through  Organization  unit  to 
implement system and device policies. 
• Implement network security measures to protect data, software, and hardware. 
• Perform diagnostics troubleshooting.

• Assist   the   Database   Administrator   and   Network   Administrator   in   developing   and 
implementing plans for new enterprise applications. 
• Participate in Business Continuity Planning and Exercises as needed. 
• Responsible for production support activities for facilities operations to ensure the security 
and stability of the environment. 
• Design, maintain, and troubleshoot Active Directory group policies, login scripts, DNS and 
DHCP. 
• Maintain Active Directory and virtual servers. 
• Responsible for  maintaining  the  system  and  ensuring  that  it  remains  operational  and 
efficient  over  time.  This  involves  monitoring  the  system,  identifying,  and  fixing  any 
problems, and upgrading the system when necessary. 
• Responsible  for  documenting  the  system  design, implementation,  and  maintenance 
processes. This documentation is essential for future reference and for training new team 
members.

• Conducted regular system audits and implemented security measures to protect sensitive 
data and prevent unauthorized access.

software upgrades, system migrations, and hardware deployments.
